- Pop up that notifies customers of the driver's arrival has been fixed.
- Customer is no longer charged 1SGD when a new credit card has been added.

- Pop up that notifies customers of the driver's arrival has been fixed.
- Customer is no longer charged 1SGD when a new credit card has been added.

- Compatibility issue on iOS 9 fixed
- Driver arrival time will now be updated correctly
- Previoud payment method used is now applied as the next payment method

- Compatibility issue on iOS 9 fixed
- Driver arrival time will now be updated correctly
- Previoud payment method used is now applied as the next payment method

- When you book a ride using a card payment method, the payment will now be made when you have been matched with a driver (the payment is put on hold until the end of the ride) not when the ride is completed. The payment is put on hold in case there are additional charges such as toll fees.

- Now that the payment is made before the ride (for credit card payments only), a pop up message will be shown when your credit card is being charged.

- Other bugs fixed

- When you book a ride using a card payment method, the payment will now be made when you have been matched with a driver (the payment is put on hold until the end of the ride) not when the ride is completed. The payment is put on hold in case there are additional charges such as toll fees.

- Now that the payment is made before the ride (for credit card payments only), a pop up message will be shown when your credit card is being charged.

- Other bugs fixed

- Restrict pickup and drop off to designated spots for F1 event on (9/14 - 9/16)
- Added feature that allows riders to send their feedback to the TADA team
- Other bugs fixed

- Restrict pickup and drop off to designated spots for F1 event on (9/14 - 9/16)

- When the driver receives a back to back job, the rider will be notified that the driver is dropping off the previous rider first

- A booking can be made even if the initial location captured is not your current location.
- App will work normally even if additional stop is added after a ride search has been made.

- If an already subscribed user tries to authenticate thier mobile number, an error message will be shown.
- Other bugs fixed.
